extendedInfo.description: You have collecting energy ahead of you! Make all the puzzles and donât fall into traps.You are gonna meet teleports, buttons, magnetic fields and other things will keep you busy! They can both make difficulties and help you. Watch the video! You are gonna like it! :-)Very simple controls:Control the sphere which takes energy from orange batteries and takes it to blue once. Move your finger on the screen to aim. Releasing your finger creates a blast wave which pushes the energy sphere in specified direction. Try. Itâs really simple!Features:- Awesome graphics and effects- Unique physics based gameplay.- Absorbing puzzles are gonna leave no one indifferent.- Lots of elaborated ad balanced levels.- Each of 4 chapters has its own setting!- Each of the chapters has its own rules of play. Look for new solution strategies instead of being bored.- You can be awarded three stars after a lever is complete.You have never played such a game!Enjoy!*This is lite version, purchase full version to unlock all content.
